greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is composite and the n-th Stern polynomial B(n,x) is irreducible, 0 otherwise.
comment: Characteristic function for A186892, apart from its initial term.
See also A186891 about related Ulas & Ulas conjecture.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A305892(n) = (!isprime(n) && polisirreducible(ps(n))); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 16 2018, after _Charles R Greathouse IV_'s Apr 07 2015 code for A186892.
xref: Differs from A305821 for the first time at n=65, where a(65) = 1, while A305821(65) = 0.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 16 2018
